description: This file implements functions related to processing the start line of an HTTP request message, including deleting, parsing, and copying the start line within an HTTP request object.

classes.name: HTTP_BMO_REQ_OBJECT
classes.description: Object representing an HTTP request with methods for managing its start line and request info.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpBmoReqDelStartLine(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Clears the start line information of the HTTP request object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpBmoReqParseStartLine(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Parses the start line from the request header buffer and fills the request info structure.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpBmoReqCopyStartLineFrom(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,PULONG pulSize)
methods.description: Copies the start line from internal structures into an external buffer using the request info.

calls: ANSC_STATUS HttpBmoReqCopyStartLineFrom(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject, PVOID buffer, PULONG pulSize)
